message: “I was trafficked into slavery as a domestic worker where I didn’t earn anything, bore inhumane treatment, and sexual abuses,”

data.description: WASHINGTON—Three years ago, Francisca Awah Mbuli took a job teaching English in the Middle East, thinking it would help get her family on track financially. But, when she arrived, she discovered there was no such job. “I was trafficked into slavery as a domestic worker where I didn’t earn anyt...
data.title: Human Trafficking, a Global Issue Needing Local Solutions
